3.「……そいつは 新しい賢者か？: ... Is that the new wise guy?

4.「う…ううん！| まだ賢者には なっていないの。| でも 今 転職の試験を 終え: Uh... No! I haven't become a sage yet. But|I've just finished a job interview...

6.「彼女が 幼なじみの シェリル。| あのドゥラさまと 院長の座を争ったほど| 実: She was my childhood friend... She was so|powerful and wise that she competed with Lord|Dula for the position of Abbot.

7.「ドゥラさまと シェリルのふたりで| ドルワームの知を司る 賢狼の爪と牙……なん:
Lady Dura and Cheryl, you two are the claws|and fangs of the wise wolf who controls the|knowledge of the dhole worm. The claws and|
|fangs of a wise wolf.

8.「最近は この研究院にも| 顔を 出さなくなったんだけど| 今日は どうしたのか: I haven't seen you at the institute lately,|but I wonder what happened today...

9.<if_woman>「ああっ！ ごめんね また話が脱線しちゃった！| <pc>ち: <if_woman>Aah! Sorry, I got sidetracked again!<pc>   I'll report to Miss Teeza that you passed the|test, so don't worry!<else>Aah! Sorry, I got sidetracked again!<pc> I'll tell Teeza-san that you passed the test,|so don't worry!<endif>

10.<if_woman>「ティーザさんの所に行けば| 賢者に 転職できるようにしてく: <if_woman>If you go to Tisa, she'll help you get a new|job as a sage! Congratulations.<pc>   Hey!<else>If you go to Tisa, she'll help you get a new|job as a sage! Congratulations.<pc> Kun!<endif>
